/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars of various colors are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. In the distance, mountains can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the buildings and trees, which gives a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene.
